page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content:
THE INDUSTRY IN OUR AREA HAS BEEN GREATLY REDUCED IN THE PAST FEW YEARS WITH THE{CLOSURE}OF SOME OF THE MAIN FACTORIES IN THE AREA INCLUDING THE GOODYEAR TYRE FACTORY AND ALSO THE SINGER SEWING MACHINE FACTORY.BOTH OF THESE EMPLOYED OVER{8,000 PEOPLE.}
IN THE PAST FEW YEARS THERE HAVE BEEN RUMOURS ABOUT DIFFERENT COMPANIES TAKING OVER THE GOODYEAR COMPLEX BUT NOW IT LOOKS LIKE BEING MADE INTO A SPORTS CENTRE.APART FROM THE RELATIVELY SMALL FACTORIES (EG.FLECKS BAKERIES)THERE IS THE BARR&STROUD FACTORY IN TEMPLE WHICH EMPLOYS OVER 1,000 PEOPLE IN MAKING EQUIPMENT FOR THE ARMED FORCES INCLUDING PERISCOPES FOR THE NAVY'S SUBMARINES. ALL IN ALL THE INDUSTRIAL CLIMATE IS NOT SO GOOD AT THE MOMENT AS SEEN BY THE HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT FIGURES.
